title: Why did my league crash in the middle of a game and not let me back in?
body:
When my game crashed, I clicked reconnect a bunch of times and it didn't work. Why? then I got a warning even though it was THE GAME THAT DIDNT LET ME BACK IN
Someone lift it pls?

replies.body:
There was a service incident going on when you posted this that was resolved shortly afterwards. This may have affected the outcome of that match, due to our steps taken during the incident.

If you're still having issues that cause you to disconnect, please let me know.

so can my punishment be lifted pls?
I didn't want to leave

We cannot modify or remove [Leaverbuster ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ) penalties. This is because regardless of intent, all disconnections negatively impact everyone in the match, therefore all disconnections are treated equally. Additionally, it takes a trend of disconnections before you'll see a leaverbuster low-priority queue because we understand that emergencies happen and would not wish to punish someone for a single instance. 

Let me know if you have any other questions.
